price: Dájúdájú Àwa kúkú máa ṣàrànṣe fún àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ Wa àti àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo nínú ìgbésí ayé yìí àti ní ọjọ́ tí àwọn ẹlẹ́rìí yó dìde (ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde).
arabic: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā lananṣuru rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wayawma yaqūmu al-ashhādu
